summary: I'm an impassioned engineer who grew up tinkering with computers, networks, and systems. Currently based out of San Francisco, you'll find me active in the software community constantly tailoring my craft. My general strategy focuses on achieving code quality and longetivity amidst pressing business objectives.

careers.name: Socotra
responsibilities: Architected and implemented web application for insurance industries in Africa and Asia
Designed infrastructure to meet latency and performance requirements across third world internet connections
Prototyped and built end-to-end testing framework to verify code safety
Coordinated with deployments and traveled to Africa to ensure product success

careers.name: Koality, Acquired by Docker
responsibilities: Built and led team of engineers, salesmen, and marketers to create an on-premise testing solution
Designed secure and scalable backend infrastructure by leveraging cloud architectures
Distilled complex concepts into a simple application with a focus on user experience
Conducted numerous exploratory customer meetings to determine project requirements
Managed customer relationships, including feature requests and bug handling

careers.name: Palantir
responsibilities: Helped government organizations better understand complex and unstructured data
Worked with teams of engineers and designers to release multiple world-changing projects

careers.name: Microsoft
